TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AntiForgeryConfig extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides programmatic configuration for the anti-forgery token system.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.Helpers.IAntiForgeryAdditionalDataProvider AdditionalDataProvider { get; set; }
.property class System.Web.Helpers.IAntiForgeryAdditionalDataProvider AdditionalDataProvider
Public Shared Property AdditionalDataProvider As IAntiForgeryAdditionalDataProvider
member this.AdditionalDataProvider : System.Web.Helpers.IAntiForgeryAdditionalDataProvider with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets a data provider that can provide additional data to put into all generated tokens and that can validate additional data in incoming tokens.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string CookieName { get; set; }
.property string CookieName
Public Shared Property CookieName As String
member this.CookieName : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the cookie that is used by the anti-forgery system.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool RequireSsl { get; set; }
.property bool RequireSsl
Public Shared Property RequireSsl As Boolean
member this.RequireSsl : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the anti-forgery cookie requires SSL in order to be returned to the server.
Docs.value: true if SSL is required to return the anti-forgery cookie to the server; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool SuppressIdentityHeuristicChecks { get; set; }
.property bool SuppressIdentityHeuristicChecks
Public Shared Property SuppressIdentityHeuristicChecks As Boolean
member this.SuppressIdentityHeuristicChecks : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the anti-forgery system should skip checking for conditions that might indicate misuse of the system.
Docs.value: true if the anti-forgery system should not check for possible misuse; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool SuppressXFrameOptionsHeader { get; set; }
.property bool SuppressXFrameOptionsHeader
Public Shared Property SuppressXFrameOptionsHeader As Boolean
member this.SuppressXFrameOptionsHeader : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Specifies whether to suppress the generation of X-Frame-Options header which is used to prevent ClickJacking. By default, the X-Frame-Options header is generated with the value SAMEORIGIN. If this setting is 'true', the X-Frame-Options header will not be generated for the response.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string UniqueClaimTypeIdentifier { get; set; }
.property string UniqueClaimTypeIdentifier
Public Shared Property UniqueClaimTypeIdentifier As String
member this.UniqueClaimTypeIdentifier : string with get, set

Docs.summary: If claims-based authorization is in use, gets or sets the claim type from the identity that is used to uniquely identify the user.
